ConvenientEffects.SettingAppControlsPermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to see and apply Convenient Effects through the application via the button on token controls. Setting this to None will disable the button entirely.
ConvenientEffects.SettingCreateFoldersPermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to create new effect folders in the Convenient Effects application. Setting this to None will disable the create button entirely. Note that a user must also have the Foundry permission to create items in order for this to work.
ConvenientEffects.KeybindingToggleAppHint: This will either open the Convenient Effects app if it is closed or close it if it is currently open.
ConvenientEffects.ResetSystemEffectsWarning: This will completely reset to the built-in effects, undoing any custom creations, deletions, or edits that were made.
ConvenientEffects.NoPermissionToRemoveEffect: You do not have permission to remove the effect {effectName} from {originalFolderName}. Duplicated effect onto {newFolderName}
ConvenientEffects.NoPermissionToAddEffect: You do not have permission to add effect {effectName} to folder {newFolderName}
ConvenientEffects.ConfigFoundryEffectIdHint: This is the foundry effect ID and can be used for finding, adding, or removing an effect.
ConvenientEffects.ConfigConvenientEffectIdHint: This is the Convenient effect ID and can be used for finding, adding, or removing an effect.
ConvenientEffects.ConfigTemporaryHint: If checked, this effect will always be labeled as a temporary effect, even if it doesn't have a duration or status.
ConvenientEffects.ConfigViewableHint: If checked, this effect will always be shown in the application.
ConvenientEffects.ConfigDynamicHint: If checked, this effect will have dynamic effects applied based on the actor data. This cannot be changed and is used for very specific effect cases.
ConvenientEffects.ConfigNestedEffectsHint: The nested effects that will be shown as options when the effect is added or removed.
ConvenientEffects.ConfigSubEffectsHint: The sub-effects that will be applied in relation to this effect. If this effect is removed, all sub-effects are automatically removed as well.
ConvenientEffects.ConfigOtherEffectsHint: The other effects that will be applied in relation to this effect. If this effect is removed, the other effects will not be automatically removed.

AcidArrow.name: Acid Arrow
AcidArrow.description: Causes 2d4 acid damage at the end of next turn

Aid.name: Aid
Aid.description: Add to current and maximum hit points for 8 hours

AlterSelf.name: Alter Self
AlterSelf.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour

AntilifeShell.name: Antilife Shell
AntilifeShell.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour

ArcaneHand.name: Arcane Hand
ArcaneHand.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.description: Subtract 1d4 from all saving throws and attack rolls for 1 minute

BardicInspiration.name: Bardic Inspiration
BardicInspiration.description: Add a dice to a single ability check, attack roll, or saving throw in the next 10 minutes

BardicInspirationD10.name: Bardic Inspiration (d10)
BardicInspirationD10.description: For bards from level 10 to level 14

BardicInspirationD12.name: Bardic Inspiration (d12)
BardicInspirationD12.description: For bards from level 15 to level 20

BardicInspirationD6.name: Bardic Inspiration (d6)
BardicInspirationD6.description: For bards from level 1 to level 4

BardicInspirationD8.name: Bardic Inspiration (d8)
BardicInspirationD8.description: For bards from level 5 to level 9

BeaconOfHope.name: Beacon of Hope
BeaconOfHope.description: Adds advantage to wisdom saving throws and death saving throws for 1 minute

BearsEndurance.name: Bear's Endurance
BearsEndurance.description: Advantage on constitution checks and 2d6 temp hit points for 1 hour

BeltOfDwarvenkind.name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
BeltOfDwarvenkind.description:
- Adds +2 to constitution to a maximum of 20
- Adds poison resistance
- Adds darkvision
- Adds dwarvish language

BeltOfGiantStrength.name: Belt of Giant Strength
BeltOfGiantStrength.description: Choose between the Belt of Hill Giant Strength, Belt of Frost Giant Strength, Belt of Stone Giant Strength, Belt of Fire Giant Strength, Belt of Cloud Giant Strength, or Belt of Storm Giant Strength

BlackTentacles.name: Black Tentacles
BlackTentacles.description: Apply the effects of the restrained condition for 1 minute

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description: Add 1d4 to all saving throws and attack rolls for 1 minute

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description:
- A blinded creature can't see and automatically fails any ability check that requires sight.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage.

BlindingSickness.name: Blinding Sickness
BlindingSickness.description: Disadvantage on wisdom checks and wisdom saving throws for 7 days

Blindness.name: Blindness
Blindness.description: Disadvantage on attack rolls while granting advantage to all who attack for 1 minute

Blur.name: Blur
Blur.description: Grants disadvantage to all who attack for 1 minute

BonusAction.name: Bonus Action
BonusAction.description: No active effects and expires on turn start

BracersOfArchery.name: Bracers of Archery
BracersOfArchery.description:
- Adds +2 to ranged attack damage
- Adds proficiency in longbow and shortbow

BullsStrength.name: Bull's Strength
BullsStrength.description: Advantage on strength checks and double maximum carrying capacity for 1 hour

BullseyeLantern.name: Bullseye Lantern
BullseyeLantern.description: Adds lantern light in a 60 degree cone for 6 hours (requires ATL)

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: Adds candle light for 1 hour (requires ATL)

CatsGrace.name: Cat's Grace
CatsGrace.description: Advantage on dexterity checks for 1 hour

ChannelDivinitySacredWeapon.name: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon
ChannelDivinitySacredWeapon.description: Add charisma modifier (minimum +1) to all weapon attack rolls and emits 20/40 light for 1 minute (requires ATL)

ChannelDivinityTurnTheUnholy.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Unholy
ChannelDivinityTurnTheUnholy.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute. Expires on taking damage.

ChannelDivinityTurnUndead.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
ChannelDivinityTurnUndead.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute. Expires on taking damage.

CharmPerson.name: Charm Person
CharmPerson.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description:
- A charmed creature can't attack the charmer or target the charmer with harmful abilities or magical effects.
- The charmer has advantage on any ability check to interact socially with the creature.

CloakOfDisplacement.name: Cloak of Displacement
CloakOfDisplacement.description: Grants disadvantage to all who attack

CloakOfProtection.name: Cloak of Protection
CloakOfProtection.description: Adds +1 to AC and +1 to all saving throws

Command.name: Command
Command.description: No active effects and lasts until the end of next turn

Concentrating.name: Concentrating
Concentrating.description: Some Spells require you to maintain Concentration in order to keep their magic active. If you lose Concentration, such a spell ends.

Contagion.name: Contagion
Contagion.description: Choose between blinding sickness, filth fever, flesh rot, mindfire, seizure, or slimy doom

CoverHalf.name: Cover (Half)
CoverHalf.description: Adds 2 to AC and dexterity saving throws

CoverThreeQuarters.name: Cover (Three-Quarters)
CoverThreeQuarters.description: Adds 5 to AC and dexterity saving throws

CoverTotal.name: Cover (Total)
CoverTotal.description: Causes all attacks to fail automatically

Darkvision.name: Darkvision
Darkvision.description: Upgrade darkvision to 60 ft. for 8 hours

Deafened.name: Deafened
Deafened.description: - A deafened creature can't hear and automatically fails any ability check that requires hearing.

Deafness.name: Deafness
Deafness.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute

DisguiseSelf.name: Disguise Self
DisguiseSelf.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour

DivineFavor.name: Divine Favor
DivineFavor.description: Add 1d4 radiant damage to weapon attacks for 1 minute

DivineWord.name: Divine Word
DivineWord.description: Adds various effects based on the remaining hit points
DivineWord.stunned: Blinded, deafened, and stunned for 1 hour

Dodge.name: Dodge
Dodge.description: Grants disadvantage to all who attack and advantage on all dexterity saving throws until next turn

EaglesSplendor.name: Eagle's Splendor
EaglesSplendor.description: Advantage on charisma checks for 1 hour

EnhanceAbility.name: Enhance Ability
EnhanceAbility.description: Choose between Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendor, Fox's Cunning, or Owl's Wisdom

Enlarge.name: Enlarge
Enlarge.description: Add 1d4 to damage and advantage on strength checks and strength saving throws for 1 minute

Exhaustion2.name: Exhaustion 2
Exhaustion2.description: Disadvantage on ability checks and speed halved

Exhaustion3.name: Exhaustion 3
Exhaustion3.description: Disadvantage on ability checks, speed halved, and disadvantage on attacks and saving throws

Exhaustion4.name: Exhaustion 4
Exhaustion4.description: Disadvantage on ability checks, speed halved, disadvantage on attacks and saving throws, and hit point maximum halved

Exhaustion5.name: Exhaustion 5
Exhaustion5.description: Disadvantage on ability checks, speed reduced to 0, disadvantage on attacks and saving throws, and hit point maximum halved

FaerieFire.name: Faerie Fire
FaerieFire.description: Grants advantage to all who attack for 1 minute

FeatherFall.name: Feather Fall
FeatherFall.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute

Feeblemind.name: Feeblemind
Feeblemind.description: Set intelligence and charisma scores to 1 until removed

FilthFever.name: Filth Fever
FilthFever.description: Disadvantage on strength checks strength saving throws, and attacks that use strength for 7 days

FindThePath.name: Find the Path
FindThePath.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 day

FireShield.name: Fire Shield
FireShield.description: Choose between cold or fire resistance

FireShieldColdResistance.name: Fire Shield (Cold Resistance)
FireShieldColdResistance.description: Add damage resistance to cold for 10 minutes

FireShieldFireResistance.name: Fire Shield (Fire Resistance)
FireShieldFireResistance.description: Add damage resistance to fire for 10 minutes

Flanked.name: Flanked
Flanked.description: Grants advantage to all who melee attack

Flanking.name: Flanking
Flanking.description: Grants advantage on melee attack rolls

FleshRot.name: Flesh Rot
FleshRot.description: Disadvantage on charisma checks and vulnerability to all damage

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description: Upgrade flying speed to 60 ft. for 10 minutes

Foresight.name: Foresight
Foresight.description: Grants advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws while granting disadvantage to all who attack for 8 hours

FoxsCunning.name: Fox's Cunning
FoxsCunning.description: Advantage on intelligence checks for 1 hour

FreedomOfMovement.name: Freedom of Movement
FreedomOfMovement.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description:
- A frightened creature has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls while the source of its fear is within line of sight.
- The creature can't willingly move closer to the source of its fear.

GlobeOfInvulnerability.name: Globe of Invulnerability
GlobeOfInvulnerability.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description:
- A grappled creature's speed becomes 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed.
- The condition ends if the grappler is incapacitated.
- The condition also ends if an effect removes the grappled creature from the reach of the grappler or grappling effect.

GreatWeaponMaster.name: Great Weapon Master
GreatWeaponMaster.description: Subtracts 5 from melee attacks but adds 10 to melee damage

GreaterInvisibility.name: Greater Invisibility
GreaterInvisibility.description: Grants advantage on attack rolls while forcing disadvantage to all who attack for 1 minute

Guidance.name: Guidance
Guidance.description: Adds 1d4 to one ability or skill check for 1 minute

GuidingBolt.name: Guiding Bolt
GuidingBolt.description: Grants advantage to next attacker or until the end of next turn

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description: Double speed, add 2 to AC, and advantage on dexterity saving throws for 1 minute

HeavilyEncumbered.name: Heavily Encumbered
HeavilyEncumbered.description: Lowers movement by 20 ft., disadvantage on all attack rolls, and disadvantage on strength, dexterity, and constitution saves

HeroesFeast.name: Heroes' Feast
HeroesFeast.description: Immunity to poison and frightened, make all wisdom saving throws with advantage, and hit point maximum increases by 2d10 for 24 hours

HideousLaughter.name: Hideous Laughter
HideousLaughter.description: Apply the effects of the prone and incapacitated conditions for 1 minute

HoldMonster.name: Hold Monster
HoldMonster.description: Apply the effects of the paralyzed condition for 1 minute

HoldPerson.name: Hold Person
HoldPerson.description: Apply the effects of the paralyzed condition for 1 minute

HolyAura.name: Holy Aura
HolyAura.description: Advantage on saving throws, grant disadvantage to all who attack, and emit dim light in 5 radius (requires ATL) for 1 minute

HoodedLantern.name: Hooded Lantern
HoodedLantern.description: Adds hooded lantern light for 6 hours (requires ATL)

HuntersMark.name: Hunter's Mark
HuntersMark.description: No active effects and lasts until removed (for now)

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: - An incapacitated creature can't take actions or reactions

Inspiration.name: Inspiration
Inspiration.description: Advantage on everything and expires after any action, save, check, or skill roll

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: Grants advantage on next attack roll while forcing disadvantage to all who attack for 1 hour. Expires after 1 attack.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description:
- An invisible creature is impossible to see without the aid of magic or a special sense. For the purpose of hiding, the creature is heavily obscured. The creature's location can be detected by any noise it makes or any tracks it leaves.
- Attack rolls against the creature have disadvantage, and the creature's attack rolls have advantage.

IrresistibleDance.name: Irresistible Dance
IrresistibleDance.description: Zero movement, disadvantage on dexterity saving throws, disadvantage on attack rolls, and grants advantage to all who attack for 1 minute

Jump.name: Jump
Jump.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute

KiEmptyBody.name: Ki: Empty Body
KiEmptyBody.description: Grants advantage on attack rolls, forces disadvantage to all who attack, and grants resistance to all damage except force for 1 minute

KiPatientDefense.name: Ki: Patient Defense
KiPatientDefense.description: Grants disadvantage to all who attack and advantage on all dexterity saving throws until next turn

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: Adds lantern light for 6 hours (requires ATL)

Longstrider.name: Longstrider
Longstrider.description: Increase all movement by 10 ft. for 1 hour

MageArmor.name: Mage Armor
MageArmor.description: Upgrades armor to 13 + dex modifier for 8 hours

MantleOfSpellResistance.name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
MantleOfSpellResistance.description: Adds advantage on saving throws against spells

MindBlank.name: Mind Blank
MindBlank.description: Adds immunity to psychic damage for 24 hours

Mindfire.name: Mindfire
Mindfire.description: Disadvantage on intelligence checks and intelligence saving throws for 7 days

MirrorImage.name: Mirror Image
MirrorImage.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute

OwlsWisdom.name: Owl's Wisdom
OwlsWisdom.description: Advantage on wisdom checks for 1 hour

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description:
- A paralyzed creature is incapacitated (see the condition) and can't move or speak.
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
- Any attack that hits the creature is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature.

PassWithoutTrace.name: Pass without Trace
PassWithoutTrace.description: Add 10 to stealth checks for 1 hour

PeriaptOfProofAgainstPoison.name: Periapt of Proof Against Poison
PeriaptOfProofAgainstPoison.description: Adds immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition

Petrified.name: Petrified
Petrified.description:
- A petrified creature is transformed, along with any nonmagical object it is wearing or carrying, into a solid inanimate substance (usually stone). Its weight increases by a factor of ten, and it ceases aging.
- The creature is incapacitated (see the condition), can't move or speak, and is unaware of its surroundings.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
- The creature has resistance to all damage.
- The creature is immune to poison and disease, although a poison or disease already in its system is suspended, not neutralized. Remove all movement, grant advantage to all who attack, and add damage resistance to all magical and physical attacks

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: - A poisoned creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description:
- A prone creature's only movement option is to crawl, unless it stands up and thereby ends the condition.
- The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
- An attack roll against the creature has advantage if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature. Otherwise, the attack roll has disadvantage.

ProtectionFromAcid.name: Protection from Acid
ProtectionFromAcid.description: Adds damage resistance to acid for 1 hour

ProtectionFromCold.name: Protection from Cold
ProtectionFromCold.description: Adds damage resistance to cold for 1 hour

ProtectionFromEnergy.name: Protection from Energy
ProtectionFromEnergy.description: Choose between acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder resistance

ProtectionFromEvilAndGood.name: Protection from Evil and Good
ProtectionFromEvilAndGood.description: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes

ProtectionFromFire.name: Protection from Fire
ProtectionFromFire.description: Adds damage resistance to fire for 1 hour

ProtectionFromLightning.name: Protection from Lightning
ProtectionFromLightning.description: Adds damage resistance to lightning for 1 hour

ProtectionFromPoison.name: Protection from Poison
ProtectionFromPoison.description: Adds resistance to poison for 1 hour (does not grant automatic advantage on saving throws against poison)

ProtectionFromThunder.name: Protection from Thunder
ProtectionFromThunder.description: Adds damage resistance to thunder for 1 hour

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description: Advantage on strength checks and strength saving throws, a variable bonus to melee damage based on barbarian level, and resistance to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage for 1 minute. Also handles Path of the Totem Warrior resistances.
Rage.notABarbarian: Selected actor is not a Barbarian

Reaction.name: Reaction
Reaction.description: No active effects and expires on turn start

Ready.name: Ready
Ready.description: No active effects and expires on turn start

RecklessAttack.name: Reckless Attack
RecklessAttack.description: Advantage on melee attacks for a turn and grants advantage to those who attack for 1 round

RecklessAttackAdvantageOnAttacks.name: Reckless Attack (advantage on attacks)
RecklessAttackAdvantageOnAttacks.description: Advantage on melee attacks until end of turn

Reduce.name: Reduce
Reduce.description: Subtract 1d4 from damage and disadvantage on strength checks and strength saving throws for 1 minute

Regenerate.name: Regenerate
Regenerate.description: Regain 1 hit point at the start of each turn for 1 hour

ResilientSphere.name: Resilient Sphere
ResilientSphere.description: Adds total immunity to all damage and half movement for 1 minute

Resistance.name: Resistance
Resistance.description: Add 1d4 to a single saving throw in the next minute

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description:
- A restrained creature's speed becomes 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage.
- The creature has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

RingOfResistance.name: Ring of Resistance
RingOfResistance.description: Choose between acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder resistance

RingOfFreeAction.name: Ring of Free Action
RingOfFreeAction.description: Adds immunity to paralyzed and restrained

RobeOfEyes.name: Robe of Eyes
RobeOfEyes.description: Advantage on perception checks, upgrade darkvision to 120 ft., and upgrade truesight to 120 ft.

RobeOfTheArchmagi.name: Robe of the Archmagi
RobeOfTheArchmagi.description: Sets base AC to 15 + dex modifier, adds advantage on saving throws against spells, and adds +2 to spell attack rolls and spell DC

Seizure.name: Seizure
Seizure.description: Disadvantage on dexterity checks, dexterity saving throws, and attacks that use dexterity for 7 days

Sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
Sharpshooter.description: Subtracts 5 from ranged attacks but adds 10 to ranged damage

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: Add 5 to AC until next turn

ShieldOfFaith.name: Shield of Faith
ShieldOfFaith.description: Adds 2 to the AC for 10 minutes

SlimyDoom.name: Slimy Doom
SlimyDoom.description: Disadvantage on constitution checks and constitution saving throws for 7 days

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: Halves movement and and subtract 2 from AC and dexterity saving throws for 1 minute

SpeakWithAnimals.name: Speak with Animals
SpeakWithAnimals.description: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes

SpeakWithDead.name: Speak with Dead
SpeakWithDead.description: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes

SpeakWithPlants.name: Speak with Plants
SpeakWithPlants.description: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Grants climbing speed equal to walking speed for 1 hour

SpiritGuardians.name: Spirit Guardians
SpiritGuardians.description: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes

SpiritualWeapon.name: Spiritual Weapon
SpiritualWeapon.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute

Stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
Stoneskin.description: Adds resistance to non-magical physical damage for 1 hour

StoneOfGoodLuck.name: Stone of Good Luck
StoneOfGoodLuck.description: Adds +1 to all checks and saves

Stunned.name: Stunned
Stunned.description:
- A stunned creature is incapacitated (see the condition), can't move, and can speak only falteringly.
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description: No active effects and lasts for 8 hours

Telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
Telekinesis.description: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: Adds torch light for 1 hour (requires ATL)

TrueStrike.name: True Strike
TrueStrike.description: Grants advantage on next attack or until the end of next turn

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description:
- An unconscious creature is incapacitated (See the condition) can't move or speak, and is unaware of its surroundings.
- The creature drops whatever its holding and falls prone (See the condition).
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
- Any attack that hits the creature is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature.

ViciousMockery.name: Vicious Mockery
ViciousMockery.description: Grants disadvantage on next attack or until the end of next turn

WardingBond.name: Warding Bond
WardingBond.description: Adds 1 to AC and saving throws and grants resistance to all damage for 1 hour

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: No active effects and lasts for 24 hours

WaterWalk.name: Water Walk
WaterWalk.description: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
